sentences.cn: “妈妈，”她拖长了声音，平静地说道。

sentences.en: Back off, Mom, I'm old enough to make my own decisions!
sentences.cn: 你别管，妈妈，我已经能够自己作决定了！

sentences.en: Everyone apart from Mom had gone home.
sentences.cn: 除了妈妈,大家都回家了.

sentences.en: He and my mom were arguing every night, hour after hour.
sentences.cn: 他和我妈妈每天晚上都吵个不停。

sentences.en: I used to stay up late with my mom and watch movies.
sentences.cn: 我以前总是和妈妈一起熬夜看电影。

sentences.en: Johnnie snitched on me to his mom.
sentences.cn: 约翰尼在他妈妈那儿告了我的状。

sentences.en: Mom wants to know if you guys still have that two-person tent.
sentences.cn: 妈妈想知道你们是否还有那顶双人帐篷。

sentences.en: Mom, can I go over to Lisa’s house?
sentences.cn: 妈妈，我能到莉萨家去吗？

sentences.en: Mom, can you tell me how to do it?
sentences.cn: 妈妈，能告诉我怎么做吗？

sentences.en: Mom's face was full of pain.
sentences.cn: 妈妈的脸上写满了痛苦。

sentences.en: My mom says I have to stay home tonight.
sentences.cn: 我妈说我今晚得待在家里。

sentences.en: My mom was the one who mediated between Zelda and her mom.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈充当了泽尔达和她妈妈之间的调解人。

sentences.en: We waited for Mom and Dad to get home.
When I used to do that when I was a kid, my mom would spank me.
sentences.cn: 我还是个孩子的时候常常干那种事，每次妈妈总是打我的屁股。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 足球妈妈；非常重视小孩休闲活动，亲自开车接送小孩参加运动，活动的母亲
